summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the execution and extension of an agreement with the United States of America, Equal Employment Opportunity Commission for financial assistance to the Department of Human Rights for investigation, resolution and processing of discrimination complaints; creating certain positions in the Department of Human Rights and increasing certain objects of expenditure in the 1976 Budget of the Human Rights Department in connection therewith; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
